#summary Setting up Moveable Weather
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

To setup Moveable Weather, you'll have to set up the following major components:

  # [DownloadCustomize Download and customize the source files.]
  # [TropoSetup Create and setup  new Tropo app.]
  # [RegisterDomain Register the domain of your new App Engine app.]
  # [BulkLoad Bulk load zip code data.]
  # [BulkLoadTideStations For Moveable Tides, bulk load tide station data.]
  # [BulkLoadTideStations For Moveable History, bulk load NRHP data.]
